column4: Ein gebrechlicher, berobter Man wird in Euren Thronsaal geführt und Eure Wachen erklären, dass er gerade mit dem Schiff von Miklagard eingetroffen ist. Der Mann sprach nur wieder und wieder Euren Namen, daher wurde er zu Euch gebracht. Voller Erschrecken erkennt Ihr ihn schließlich als [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
column6: Un hombre frágil vestido con túnica es conducido a tu sala del trono, y tus guardias explican que acaba de llegar en un barco procedente de Miklagård. El hombre sólo dice tu nombre una y otra vez, y por eso lo han llevado a ti. Para tu horror, ¡lo reconoces por fin como [From.GetTitledFirstName]!

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has finally returned home after a long and successful time with the Sons of Gwydion! He fought in several battles, and learned much from the clever strategies and tactics favored by the band in their raids.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] est finalement de retour au bercail après une fructueuse et longue carrière dans la Garde varègue ! Il a pris part à plusieurs batailles et a beaucoup appris sur les adroites stratégies et les tactiques utilisées par les Grecs et leurs ennemis au Serkland.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ist nach langer und erfolgreicher Karriere in der Warägergarde endlich heimgekehrt! Er hat in vielen Schlachten gefochten und vieles von den schlauen Strategien und Taktiken der Griechen und ihrer Feinde in Serkland erfahren.
column6: ¡[From.GetTitledFirstName] por fin ha vuelto a casa después de una larga y exitosa carrera en la Guardia Varangiana! Luchó en varias batallas, y aprendió mucho de las inteligentes estrategias y las tácticas preferidas tanto por los griegos como por sus enemigos en Serkland.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from the Circle and the Sons of Gwydion, but he refuses to speak of his experiences there. You know he took part in several battles and killed many foes, but instead of reveling in the glory of his accomplishments, [From.GetFirstName] is plagued by nightmares and jumps at sudden sounds.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] est de retour de Grèce et de la Garde varègue, mais refuse de parler de son expérience là-bas. Vous savez qu'il a pris part à plusieurs batailles et qu'il a eu raison de nombreux ennemis, mais au lieu de raconter ses glorieux exploits, [From.GetFirstName] fait des cauchemars toutes les nuits et sursaute au moindre bruit.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ist aus Griechenland und der Warägergarde zurückgekehrt, aber er weigert sich, von seinen Erlebnissen zu sprechen. Ihr wisst, dass er an etlichen Schlachten teilgenommen und viele Feinde erschlagen hat, doch statt seine glorreichen Erfolge zu feiern, wird [From.GetFirstName] von Alpträumen geplagt und erschreckt bei plötzlichen Geräuschen.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ha regresado de Grecia y de la Guardia Varangiana, pero se niega a hablar de sus experiencias allí. Tú sabes que participó en varias batallas y mató a muchos enemigos, pero en vez de deleitarse en la gloria de sus logros, [From.GetFirstName] está plagado de pesadillas y salta con los ruidos repentinos.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has come home from the Circle and his service with the Sons of Gwydion, but he is not alone. He has found a wife and brought her with him. She seems loyal and well versed in the ways of the godsshe will make a good wife.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] est de retour de Miklagård et de son service dans la Garde varègue, mais il ne revient pas seul. Il s'est marié à une Grecque et l'a ramenée avec elle. Elle n'est pas habituée à nos coutumes et à notre langue, et ne semble pas apprécier notre climat, mais elle semble vouloir faire d'ici son chez soi.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ist aus Miklagard und seinem Dienst in der Warägergarde heimgekehrt. Er hat eine griechische Braut gefunden und mitgebracht. Sie kennt unsere Gebräuche und Sprache nicht und das Wetter hier scheint ihr nicht gut zu tun, doch sie ist willig, das Beste aus ihrem neuen Heim zu machen.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ha llegado a casa de Miklagård y de su servicio con la Guardia Varangiana, pero no está solo. Ha encontrado una esposa griega y la trajo con él. Ella no conoce nuestras costumbres ni el idioma, y el clima no le gusta demasiado, pero parece estar dispuesta a hacer lo mejor de su nuevo hogar.

column2: After many years at the Circle and around Britain, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has finally been released from his service with the Sons of Gwydion and has returned home. Your son is a changed man, however. Secular matters no longer hold any interest for him, and he instead speaks incessantly of the Otherworld and the wonders of the Circle...
column3: Après plusieurs années en Grèce, [From.GetTitledFirstName] a enfin été dégagé de ses fonctions dans la Garde varègue et est rentré au bercail. Votre fils est cependant un homme changé. Les Anciens Dieux ne l'intéressent plus et il parle sans cesse du royaume des chrétiens et des horreurs qui s'abattront sur ceux qui refusent de se convertir...
column4: Nach vielen Jahren in Griechenland, wurde [From.GetTitledFirstName] endlich aus seinem Dienst in der Warägergarde entlassen und ist heimgekehrt. Doch Euer Sohn ist ein gewandelter Mann. Die alten Götter interessieren ihn nicht länger, stattdessen spricht er ununterbrochen vom Christentum und den Schrecken, die jene erwarten, die nicht konvertieren...
column6: Tras muchos años en Grecia, [From.GetTitledFirstName] ha sido finalmente liberado de su servicio a la Guardia Varangiana y ha regresado a casa. Sin embargo, tu hijo ha cambiado. Los viejos dioses ya no le interesan, y en cambio habla sin cesar de la Cristiandad y los horrores que le esperan a aquellos que se niegan a convertirse...

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from the Circle and the Sons of Gwydion as a changed man. He is wiser, more confident in his own abilities and more knowledgable in matters of war. It seems the time spent with the Wolflings did him good.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName]est de retour de Miklagård et de la Garde varègue et c'est un homme changé. Il est plus sage, plus sûr de lui et connaît très bien l'art de la guerre. Le temps qu'il a passé en Grèce semble lui avoir fait du bien.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ist als gewandelter Mann aus Miklagard und dem Dienst in der Warägergarde zurückgekehrt. Er ist weiser, zuversichtlicher und besitzt neue Kenntnisse in Kriegsangelegenheiten. Es scheint, als habe ihm die Zeit bei den Griechen gut getan.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ha vuelto de Miklagård y de la Guardia Varangiana como un hombre cambiado. Es más sabio, más seguro de sus propias habilidades y más eficiente en asuntos de guerra. Parece que el tiempo pasado en Grecia le ha hecho bien.

column2: Several former Wolves of the Sons of Gwydion have recently returned home after serving the Circle, and they bring news most grave. Your son, [From.GetTitledFirstName], fell in battle while raiding in the south. They assure you that he faced his enemy with bravery and slew many before their numbers overwhelmed him.
column3: Plusieurs anciens gardes varègues sont de retour de leur service pour le roi des Grecs depuis peu et ils apportent de mauvaises nouvelles. Votre fils, [From.GetTitledFirstName], est tombé au combat lors de la campagne du Serkland. Ils vous assurent qu'il a affronté l'ennemi avec bravoure et qu'il en a tué plusieurs avant qu'ils aient eu raison de lui.
column4: Einige frühere Waräger Gardisten sind von ihrem Dienst beim Griechenkönig heimgekehrt und bringen schlechteste Neuigkeiten mit. Euer Sohn [From.GetTitledFirstName] ist in einer Schlacht in Serkland gefallen. Sie versichern Euch, dass er seinem Feind mit Tapferkeit begegnet ist und viele erschlug, bevor ihre schiere Zahl ihn überwältigte.
column6: Varios ex guardias Varangianos han regresado recientemente a casa después de servir al rey Griego, y traen noticias graves. Tu hijo, [From.GetTitledFirstName], cayó en la batalla mientras estaba de campaña en Serkland. Te aseguran que se enfrentó a su enemigo con valentía y que mató a muchos antes de que sus números lo abrumaron.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has at last returned from the circle in a caravan filled with the spoils of war! Apparently the great druids are generous to those who serve the gods well, and there is gold here from all over the world. Your son insists on sharing these riches with you, his loving father.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] est enfin de retour de Grèce, à bord d'un drakkar contenant un impressionnant butin de guerre ! Le grand roi des Grecs est apparemment très généreux avec ceux qui le servent bien, et il y a de l'or de tous les coins de la Grèce, du Serkland et de plus loin encore. Votre fils insiste pour partager ses richesses avec vous, son père bien-aimé.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ist endlich aus Griechenland heimgekehrt, auf einem großen Beiboot, gefüllt mit Kriegsbeute. Offenbar ist der Griechenkönig großzügig gegenüber jenen, die ihm gut dienen. Hier findet sich Gold aus allen Ecken Griechenlands, Serklands und darüber hinaus. Euer Sohn besteht darauf, den Reichtum mit Euch, seinem Vater, zu teilen.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] por fin ha regresado de Grecia en un drakkar lleno de botines de guerra! Al parecer, el gran rey de los Griegos es generoso con los que le sirven bien, y hay oro aquí de todas partes del reino griego, Serkland y más allá. Tu hijo insiste en compartir estas riquezas contigo, su querido padre.

column2: Upon learning of the death of your father, you left the Sons of Gwydion and departed the Circle for home in a caravan filled with loot from your campaigns. It was a long and perilous journey back, but your feet are now firmly planted on the soil of the land that is your birthright. The throne is yours.
column3: Après avoir appris la mort de votre père, vous avez abandonné la Garde varègue et quittez Miklagård sur un drakkar pour rentrer au bercail, rapportant un important butin amassé lors de vos campagnes en Serkland. Le voyage du retour fut long et périlleux, mais vos pieds foulent maintenant la terre ferme, cette terre dont vous êtes l'héritier. Le trône est à vous.
column4: Als Ihr vom Tod Eures Vaters erfahrt, verlasst Ihr die Warägergarde und Miklagard in einem großen Beiboot, gefüllt mit der Beute Eurer Schlachten in Serkland. Es war eine lange und gefahrvolle Reise, doch jetzt setzt Ihr Eure Füße auf heimatliche Erde, dir Euer Geburtsrecht ist. Der Thron gehört Euch.
column6: Al enterarte de la muerte de tu padre, dejas la Guardia Varangiana y dejas Miklagard para volver a casa en un drakkar lleno de botines de tus campañas en Serkland. Fue un largo y peligroso viaje de regreso, pero tus pies están ahora firmemente plantados en la tierra que es tu patrimonio. El trono es tuyo.

column2: A local Augur has come to your court to perform a public Auguria, the ceremony is held in a plain outside the castle walls and while approaching clouds make you worrisome, the Augur will not postpone it. After observing the entrails of many sacrifices, the Augur is about to declaim the will of the gods when a bolt of lightning strikes him violently!

column2: While watching the latest play from a local philosopher, you notice that some of the actors are completely drunk. This is an insult to your honor and to the art of the Theatre, though the man in charge assures you they will be taken care of, it is your duty to take charge.
column3: While watching the latest play from a local philosopher, you notice that some of the actors are completely drunk. This is an insult to your honor and to the art of the Theatre, though the man in charge assures you they will be taken care of, it is your duty to take charge.

column2: As you are sitting down to dinner, your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] comes up to you and tells you that [From.GetBestName] has strayed from the true faith. Claiming to have found enlightenment in the classical texts of ancient Rome and Greece, [From.GetSheHe] has forsaken [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and professed his devotion to [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName].

column2: With the restoration of the religious institutions of old, you have the opportunity to re-establish the old imperial state religion once again, but your Christian vassals are not likely to appreciate such a decree.

column2: The citizens of Cyrenaica et Creta can rejoice, as Roman law is once more upheld in this barren land. Yet another ancient Roman province has been returned to the bosom of the mightiest empire the civilised world has ever seen. May it never suffer the cruel touch of barbarians again.

column2: Imperial rule over Sicilia, one of the last western outposts of the Empire to be lost to barbarian rule, has been reinstated yet again - this time hopefully for good.
column3: Imperial rule over Sicilia, one of the last western outposts of the Empire to be lost to barbarian rule, has been reinstated yet again - this time hopefully for good.

column2: The islands of Corsica and Sardinia, originally inorporated in the empire after the First Pulic War, is yet again under imperial rule. The conquest of this strategic location in the Mediteranian heralds a glorious westward expansion of the Empire.
column3: The islands of Corsica and Sardinia, originally inorporated in the empire after the First Pulic War, is yet again under imperial rule. The conquest of this strategic location in the Mediteranian heralds a glorious westward expansion of the Empire.

column2: Viennensis, named after the town Vienne in southeastern Gaul, has long been lost to Roman rule, but has now been incorporated back into the Empire. It was originally formed as a merger of the provinces Gallia Aquitania and Gallia Narbonensis created by Caesar after his campaigns had expanded the old province of Gaul too far to be administered as a single province.
column3: Viennensis, named after the town Vienne in southeastern Gaul, has long been lost to Roman rule, but has now been incorporated back into the Empire. It was originally formed as a merger of the provinces Gallia Aquitania and Gallia Narbonensis created by Caesar after his campaigns had expanded the old province of Gaul too far to be administered as a single province.

column2: Friends, Romans, countrymen, lend me your ears! After the miraculous recovery of territory lost centuries ago, the Roman Empire has been reborn! Europe has endured dark times since the imperial frontiers were stormed by barbarians and province after province burned at their touch, but now a bright new age has dawned for all of civilization.\n\nThe Roman State will no longer be referred to as the Empire of the Germans by jealous pretenders in the East, but recognized as the true heir to the legacy of Rome. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] rules a restored Imperium Romanum, but much work remains to be done. There is still territory to recover and ancient borders to reclaim. For the Senate and People of Rome!

column2: The Holy Roman Empire, previously referred to as the Empire of the Germans by many in the East, have somehow managed to reclaim enough lost territory to declare the Roman Empire restored! It can no longer be denied that they are the true successors of Rome and its glorious legacy. They claim a new era is upon us.

column2: Much time has passed since Luxor Temple’s last official use and the peasantry has moved into its location since then. A sad sight it is indeed to see it in its current status. You decide that it is in the best interest of everyone to restore this temple to its former glory and make it a beacon of a revitalized Kemetic religion.

column2: It would seem that the Egyptians have been very busy recently. A recent resurgence of Kemetic fanaticism has swept Egypt and the pinnacle of their fanaticism has been reached with the restoration of Luxor Temple. Located on the east bank of the Nile, this temple is both splendid to withhold and enormous in size. It even holds an entirely new wing, attached to the groundwork of the original temple.

column2: The Jewish community in my realm is prospering greatly, however there are opposing voices in my court on the matter. The republican faction actively defends the need for the community as a boon to both myself and the city, however the religious faction condemns that I am giving safe haven to them. It is undeniable that I could make a great profit by purging them from the cities they dwell in by displacing them from the realm.

column2: The pharaohs of ancient times would often have massive tombs erected in their honour during their reign. Such effort was put into the construction of these pyramids that often decades would go by before being completed and the pharaoh who commissioned the pyramid would already be long dead. Regardless, it was seen as a very prestigious and important thing to do as a pharaoh.

column2: Long has it been that Kemetism was a majority in the lands of Egypt. No longer shall false prophets of moon and sickle sway the hearts and minds of the Egyptian people. The High Priesthood of Kemetism has been restored, and a so-called Paragon Xroj shall now take of the administration of the lower Priesthood, all under the guidance of a mighty Pharaoh.

column2: Word has it that the enemies of Egypt have something new to fear. Warriors atop chariots equipped with bow and arrow alongside fearsome spear troops. column2: I have been excommunicated for the sin of dishonorable murder.
column3: J'ai été excommunié pour le péché d'un meurtre déshonorant.
column4: Ich bin für die Sünde des unehrenhaften Mords exkommuniziert worden.
column6: I have been excommunicated for the sin of dishonorable murder.

column2: Being known as a dishonorable murderer is causing me severe mentral stress. Can I really live with what I've done?
column3: Être connu comme un meurtrier me cause un sévère stress. Puis-je réellement vivre avec ce que j'ai fait ?
column4: Weil bekannt wurde das Ich ein unehrenhafter Mörder bin habe ich Mentale Probleme. Kann ich wirklich damit leben, was ich getan habe?
column6: Being known as a dishonorable murderer is causing me severe mentral stress. Can I really live with what I've done?

column2: I was listening in on my courtiers' conversation when I heard one of them call me a murderer. They are clearly working with my enemies!
column3: J'écoutais discrètement la conversation de mes courtisans lorsque j'ai entendu l'un d'eux me désigner comme un meurtrier. Il est clair qu'il travaillent pour mes ennemis!
column4: Ich hörte in einem Gespräch meiner Höflinge, das mich einer einen Mörder nannte. Sie arbeiten klar mit meinen Feinden!
column6: I was listening in on my courtiers' conversation when I heard one of them call me a murderer. They are clearly working with my enemies!

column2: The civil war is over and we have won. My loyal supporters are now eagerly expecting the rewards due for their military service. How should I reward them?

column2: A claim on a title has been discovered!
column3: Une revendication sur un titre a été découvert!
column4: Ein Anspruch auf einen Titel wurde entdeckt!
column6: A claim on a title has been discovered!

column2: I have learned that [From.GetTitledName] has laid claim to one of my titles on the grounds of ancestral inheritance.
column3: J'ai appris que [From.GetTitledName] a revendiqué l'un de mes titres sur la base de l'héritage ancestral.
column4: I have learned that [From.GetTitledName] has laid claim to one of my titles on the grounds of ancestral inheritance.
column6: I have learned that [From.GetTitledName] has laid claim to one of my titles on the grounds of ancestral inheritance.

column2: I expressed my wishes and desires for a coronation in Rome to his holiness the Pope. Hopefully he will accept my request so that I can begin inviting my lords to attend the coronation ceremony.
column3: J'ai exprimé mon souhait et mon désir d'être couronné à Rome par Sa Sainteté le Pape. Avec bon espoir il accèdera à ma requête et je pourrais commencer à inviter mes seigneurs pour qu'ils assistent au couronnement.
column4: Ich äußerte meine Wünsche und Sehnsüchte für eine Krönung in Rom, um seine Heiligkeit der Papst. Hoffentlich wird er akzeptieren meine Bitte, damit ich anfangen kann meine Herren einladen, um die Krönungszeremonie beizuwohnen.
column6: I expressed my wishes and desires for a coronation in Rome to his holiness the Pope. Hopefully he will accept my request so that I can begin inviting my lords to attend the coronation ceremony.

column2:
To the most Reverend and Blessed Apostolic Pope,

I would like to ask you for your blessing in my rule as Emperor-elect by holding officially holding a coronation ceremony in my honour.

Your most devoted subject,
[From.GetTitledName]
column3:
Au Vénérable et Bienheureux Pape Apostolique,

J'aimerais vous demander votre bénédiction pour mon règne en tant qu'Empereur-élu par la tenue d'une cérémonie de couronnement en mon honneur.

Votre sujet le plus dévoué,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
Zu den vererten und seligen Apostolischen Papst, würde 

l nich möchte Ihnen für Ihren Segen bitten werdet in meinem Herrschaft als Kaiser-elect, indem offiziell im Besitz einer Krönungszeremonie in meiner Ehre. 

 Euer ergebener Diener
column6:
To the most Reverend and Blessed Apostolic Pope,

I would like to ask you for your blessing in my rule as Emperor-elect by holding officially holding a coronation ceremony in my honour.

Your most devoted subject,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2: To the most devout and serene [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nIn the name of the Lord, I, [From.GetTitledName], would like to offer you my blessing to allow your coronation in Rome, as Holy Roman Emperor, under my guidance.
column3: Au Pieux et Sérénissime [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nAu nom de Notre Seigneur, moi, [From.GetTitledName], voudrais vous offrir ma bénédiction pour votre couronnement à Rome, comme Saint Empereur Romain, par moi conseillé.
column4: An den frommen und heitern [Root.GetTitledFirstName], \nIm Namen des Herrn, Ich, [From.GetTitledName], möchte Euch meinen Segen anbieten und Eure Krönung in Rom ermöglichen, als römisch-deutscher Kaiser.
column6: To the most devout and serene [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nIn the name of the Lord, I, [From.GetTitledName], would like to offer you my blessing to allow your coronation in Rome, as Holy Roman Emperor, under my guidance.

column2:
To his Majesty [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
In the name of the Lord, I, [From.GetTitledName], would like to inform you that I deem you are not yet worthy and just enough as a ruler to be offered my blessings to become crowned as the Holy Roman Emperor. The Lord surely has much faith in you as you have in him, but remember that the honour of receiving His blessing does not come easy and is only for the purest of souls.
Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column3:
A Sa Majesté [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Au nom de Notre Seigneur, moi, [From.GetTitledName], voudrais vous informer que je ne vous juge pas encore assez digne et juste comme souverain pour vous octroyer ma bénédiction en tant que Saint Empereur Romain couronné. Le Seigneur à sûrement plus de foi en vous que vous en Lui, mais n'oubliez pas que l'honneur de recevoir Sa Bénédiction n'est pas chose aisée et est réservé aux plus pures des âmes.
Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
An seine Majestät [Root.GetTitledFirstName], 
 Im Namen des Herrn, Wir, [From.GetTitledName], möchten Euch mitteilen, dass Wir Weuch noch nicht für würdig genug befinden, um meinen Segen und die Reichskrone der römisch-deutschen Kaiser zu emfangen. Der Herr hat sicher viel Vertrauen in Euch, wie Ihr zu ihm. Aber denkt daran, dass die Ehre der Reichskrone zur dem zuteil wird, der die reinste Seele in Seien Augen vorweist. 
 gezeichnet, 
 [From.GetTitledName]
column6:
To his Majesty [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
In the name of the Lord, I, [From.GetTitledName], would like to inform you that I deem you are not yet worthy and just enough as a ruler to be offered my blessings to become crowned as the Holy Roman Emperor. The Lord surely has much faith in you as you have in him, but remember that the honour of receiving His blessing does not come easy and is only for the purest of souls.
Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2:
To Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
You should be happy to know that, I, [From.GetTitledName], will hold a coronation ceremony in Rome in my honour with the blessing of his Holiness the Pope. You received the honour to be invited to attend the ceremony, which will be held soon in Rome. I await your postive reply.

Your most Holy Lord and Liege,
[From.GetTitledName]
column3:
Au Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Vous devriez être heureux d'apprendre que moi, [From.GetTitledName], vais organiser une cérémonie de couronnement à Rome en mon honneur avec la bénédiction de Sa Sainteté le pape. Vous avez l'honneur d'être invité pour assister à la cérémonie, qui devrait avoir lieu sous peu à Rome. J'attends votre réponse positive.

Votre Très Saint Seigneur et Suzerain,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
An den edlen [Root.GetTitledFirstName], 
 Ihr sollet froh sein, zu wissen,dass ich, [From.GetTitledName], eine Krönungszeremonie in Rom zu meinen Ehren halten werde, mit dem Segen Seiner Heiligkeit des Papstes. Ihr erhaltet die Ehre, zu dieser Zeremonie, die in Kürze in Rom stattfinden soll, eingeladen zu werden. Ich erwarte Eure positive Antwort. 

Neuer allerheiligster Herr, 
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
To Noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
You should be happy to know that, I, [From.GetTitledName], will hold a coronation ceremony in Rome in my honour with the blessing of his Holiness the Pope. You received the honour to be invited to attend the ceremony, which will be held soon in Rome. I await your postive reply.

Your most Holy Lord and Liege,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2: [From.GetTitledName] is sorry to inform you that he will not be able to attend the coronation ceremony in Rome as he has more important issues to attend to.
column3: [From.GetTitledName] est désolé de vous informer qu'il ne pourra pas assister à la cérémonie de couronnement à Rome car il a des choses plus importantes à faire.
column4: [From.GetTitledName] bedauert, Euch mitzuteilen, dass er nicht in der Lage ist, die Krönungszeremonie in Rom zu besuchen, da er wichtigere Dinge zu erledigen hat.
column6: [From.GetTitledName] is sorry to inform you that he will not be able to attend the coronation ceremony in Rome as he has more important issues to attend to.

column2: Today I was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of "Holy Roman Emperor" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope.
column3: Aujourd'hui j'ai été couronné par Sa Sainteté le Pape et ai formellement reçu le titre de "Saint Empereur Romain" et les Regalia Impériaux avec la bénédiction du Pape.
column4: Heute wurde ich von Seiner Heiligkeit dem Papst gekrönt und erhielt offiziell den Titel "Kaiser" und die Reichskleinodien mit dem Segen des Papstes.
column6: Today I was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of "Holy Roman Emperor" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope.

column2: Today [From.GetTitledFirstName] was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of "Holy Roman Emperor" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope. The ceremony was magnificent.
column3: Aujourd'hui [From.GetTitledFirstName] a été couronné par Sa Sainteté le Pape et a formellement reçu le titre de "Saint Empereur Romain" avec la bénédiction du Pape. La cérémonie était grandiose.
column4: Heute wurde [From.GetTitledFirstName] von Seiner Heiligkeit dem Papst gekrönt und erhielt offiziell den Titel "Kaiser" und die Reichskleinodien mit dem Segen des Papstes. Die Zeremonie war großartig.
column6: Today [From.GetTitledFirstName] was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of "Holy Roman Emperor" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope. The ceremony was magnificent.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been crowned and received the Imperial Regalia by his holiness the Pope in the St. Basilica in Rome. The divine blessings conveyed by his Holiness the Pope confirm the right of rule over all Imperial lands governed by [From.GetTitledFirstName] and his appointed vassals.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] a été couronné et a reçu les regalia Impériaux par Sa Sainteté le Pape en la Sainte Basilique de Rome. Les bénédictions divines transmisent par Sa Sainteté le Pape confirme son droit de régner sur toutes les terres Impériales gouvernées [From.GetTitledFirstName] et ses vassaux fieffés.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] wurde gekrönt und erhielt die Reichskleinodien von Seiner Heiligkeit dem Papst in der Basilika St. in Rom. Der göttliche Segen, vermittelt durch seine Heiligkeit den Papst, bestätigt das Recht, über alle kaiserlichen Ländereien von [From.GetTitledFirstName] und seine Vasallen zu herrschen.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been crowned and received the Imperial Regalia by his holiness the Pope in the St. Basilica in Rome. The divine blessings conveyed by his Holiness the Pope confirm the right of rule over all Imperial lands governed by [From.GetTitledFirstName] and his appointed vassals.

column2: In the name of Christ, I, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], promise, pledge and guarantee in the sight of God and the blessed Apostle Peter that I will be the protector and defender of this holy Roman Church in all ways useful to her, however many, in so far as I am supported by divine assistance according to my knowledge and ability.\n\nToday [Root.GetTitledFirstName] was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of "Holy Roman Emperor" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope.
column3: Au Nom du Christ, moi, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], promets, m'engage et jure devant Dieu et le bienheureux Apôtre Pierre que je serais le protecteur et le défenseur de la très sainte Eglise Romaine, que je la servirais en toutes occasions, ou au moins dans de nombreuses, dans la mesure où je suis soutenu par la divine assistance et en accord avec mes propres connaissances et capacités.\n\nAujourd'hui [Root.GetTitledFirstName] a été couronné par Sa Sainteté le Pape et a formellement reçu le titre de "Saint Empereur Romain" et les Regalia Impériaux avec la bénédiction du Pape.
column4: Im Namen Christi, Ich, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], Unterpfand und Garant in den Augen Gottes und der seligen Apostel Petrus, verspreche, dass ich der Beschützer und Verteidiger dieser heiligen römischen Kirche mit allen erforderlichen Mitteln sein werde. \n\n Heute wurde [Root.GetTitledFirstName] von Seiner Heiligkeit dem Papst gekrönt und erhielt offiziell den Titel "Kaiser" und die Reichskleinodien mit dem Segen des Papstes.
column6: In the name of Christ, I, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], promise, pledge and guarantee in the sight of God and the blessed Apostle Peter that I will be the protector and defender of this holy Roman Church in all ways useful to her, however many, in so far as I am supported by divine assistance according to my knowledge and ability.\n\nToday [Root.GetTitledFirstName] was crowned by his Holiness the Pope and formally received the title of "Holy Roman Emperor" and the Imperial Regalia with the blessing of the Pope.

column2: I have decided to legitimize [From.GetFullName] and make [From.GetHerHim] a member of my dynasty.
column3: J'ai décidé de legitimer [From.GetFullName] et d'en faire un membre de ma dynastie.

column2: Long has it been since the Northmen invaded these lands. Some may argue their methods, but no one can deny the effect these people had on the local tribes. As time went on they mingled with the locals to form something entirely new in the process.

column2: Around our lands more people are using this Russian language and I find this is a perfect means for an overlord to get his serfs to work properly. We continue to use our own influence to promote this means of communication in the interests of more efficient realm.

column2: Although many dislike change, this new Russian language does have a certain functionality that cannot be denied. I have therefore prevailed upon a member of my court to adopt this for everyday administrative use.

column2: I was considering important business when I had an amazing insight. To strengthen my realm I must bring my vassals round to my way of thinking. This involves communication. If I can get them to communicate like me then I will have a much smoother running realm.
column3: Je réfléchissais à une affaire importante lorsque j’ai eu une idée étonnante. Pour renforcer mon Royaume, je dois convertir mes vassaux à ma façon de penser. Cela passe par la communication. Si je parviens à leur faire adopter mon mode de communication, mon Royaume fonctionnera beaucoup mieux.
column4: Beim Nachdenken über ein wichtiges Geschäft kam ich zu einer erstaunlichen Einsicht: Zur Stärkung meines Reichs muss ich meine Vasallen von meiner Denkweise überzeugen, und dazu gehört auch die Kommunikation. Wenn ich es schaffen könnte, dass alle wie ich kommunizieren, so wäre mein Reich viel einfacher zu regieren.
column6: Estaba ocupado con asuntos importantes cuando tuve una súbita revelación. Para reforzar mi reino debo lograr que mis vasallos compartan mi forma de pensar. Eso implica comunicación. Si logro que se comuniquen como yo mi reino funcionará mucho mejor.

column4: My liege has persuaded me to embrace this notion of Russianness that is sweeping the realm.
column6: My liege has persuaded me to embrace this notion of Russianness that is sweeping the realm.

column2: At last the Great Schism between the Western Catholic Church and the Eastern Orthodox Church has been mended, but not by the either of the expected sides, but rather the Coptic church has proven to be the savior of Christendom. With the spread of the Coptic faith and the reunification of the Pentarchy, including the vital episcopal see of Constantinople, the other Christian faiths now holds little sway over the people of Europe. There will be those who still cling to it, but they will be few in number and the Pentarchy can once more claim universal rule over all of Christendom.

column2: With the city now under Coptic control, the Patriarchate of Antioch has been properly restored as one of the episcopal sees of the Pentarchy in the Coptic Church. It was originally founded by Saint Peter the Apostle, who is regarded as the first Pope by the Coptic Church.

column4: Nun da die Stadt erneut unter der Kontrolle Ost-Roms ist, wurde das Patriarchat von Antiochien, als einer der bischöflichen Arme der Pentarchie in der Orthodoxen Kirche des Ostens, wiederhergestellt. Es wurde ursprünglich vom Heiligen Apostel Petrus gegrü
column6: Con la ciudad de nuevo bajo el control romano del este, el Patriarcado de Antioquía ha sido debidamente reinstaurado como una de las sedes episcopales de la Pentarquía en la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental. La cual fue originalmente fundada por San Pedro Apóstol, considerado el primer Papa de la Iglesia católica occidental.

column2: With the city now under Coptic control, the Patriarchate of Jerusalem has been properly restored as one of the episcopal sees of the Pentarchy in the Coptic Church. It was originally founded by Saint James the Just, who was made head of the Church in Jerusalem soon after the death of Jesus.

column6: Con la ciudad de nuevo bajo el control romano del este, el Patriarcado de Jerusalén ha sido debidamente reinstaurado como una de las sedes episcopales de la Pentarquía en la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental, la cual fue originalmente fundada por Santiago el Justo, que fue nombrado jefe de la Iglesia en Jerusalén poco después de la  muerte de Jesús.

column2: With the city now under Coptic control, the Patriarchate of Alexandria has been properly restored as one of the episcopal sees of the Pentarchy in the Coptic Church. It was originally founded by Saint Mark the Evangelist, who became Alexandria's first patriarch.

column6: Con la ciudad de nuevo bajo el control romano del este, el Patriarcado de Alejandría ha sido debidamente reinstaurado como una de las sedes episcopales de la Pentarquía en la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental, que originalmente fue fundada por San Marcos Evangelista, el primer patriarca de Alejandría.

column2: With the city now under Coptic control, the Patriarchate of Constantinople has been properly restored as one of the episcopal sees of the Pentarchy in the Coptic Church. If all five historical patriarchates are returned to the Pentarchy, the Great Schism between the Eastern and Western churches may finally be mended.

column6: Con la ciudad de nuevo bajo el control romano del este, el Patriarcado de Roma ha sido debidamente reinstaurado como una de las sedes episcopales de la Pentarquía en la Iglesia Ortodoxa Oriental. Si los cinco patriarcados históricos son devueltos a la Pentarquía, el Gran Cisma entre las iglesias orientales y occidentales finalmente podrá ser reparado.

column2: A storm has struck my fleet! Scores of soldiers and at least one of my commanders have been drowned by the raging waters.
column3: Une tempête a frappé ma flotte ! Nombre de soldats et au moins un de mes commandants ont été noyés par les eaux enragées
column4: Ein Sturm hat meine Flotte versenkt! Zahlreiche Soldaten und mindestens einer meiner Befehlshabern sind in dem tobenden Wasser ertrunken.
column6: A storm has struck my fleet! Scores of soldiers and at least one of my commanders have been drowned by the raging waters.

column2: The Civil War has weakened the authority of the crown to the point where my own distant and disconnected realm cannot be considered a part of [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] any longer.

column2: Unsurprisingly the pope has chosen a promising local young Italian mercenary band to take control of Southern Italy away from the Heathens. With official Papal support this young Mercenary captain hopes to achieve the crown of Sicily, as promised by the pope.
column3: Unsurprisingly the pope has chosen a promising local young Italian mercenary band to take control of Southern Italy away from the Heathens. With official Papal support this young Mercenary captain hopes to achieve the crown of Sicily, as promised by the pope.

column2: The re-conquest of Sicily was an astounding success. The pope has motioned to officially crown the King of Sicily today. Already the pope makes plans for future such events, some have even said they’ve heard rumours of such a thing being called a Crusade. Time can only tell what will happen next.

column2: In a very surprising and bold move the Pope has decided to give the Norsemen of the North a chance to prove themselves worthy of the crown of Sicily. Of course they submitted to papal authority prior to being allowed to invade Southern Italy. This should prove to be a very interesting series of events, no matter the outcome.

column2: After having heard the success of the Normans, the pope has decided to give them an offer they can’t refuse. They’ll be allowed to invade southern Italy with full papal support. Should they succeed, they’ll be crowned by the pope himself as Kings of Sicily.

Impressed by their determination and self-sacrifice he has decided to give official papal support to these mercenaries to take back Italy. Should they succeed, the crown of Sicily awaits them.

column2: Often forgotten, but there are still resident Greeks in southern Italy. After having affirmed their support of the Pope of Rome they now seek to re-conquer their lost lands from the heathen invaders. Motivation is certainly not lacking for these people.

column2: There has not been a Kohen Gadol – a High Priest of Judaism – since the Romans destroyed the Second Temple roughly a thousand years ago. At long last, this position has been filled and the High Priesthood reconstituted.\n\nThe Samaritans have held the tradition of a Kohen Gadol steadfast, despite their exile from the Holy Land and so the Kohen Gadol himself now returns to where he belongs.

column2: As could be expected, after learning of your intention to attack him, the Pope has cast the Anathema on you. You are now excommunicated.
column3: Comme il fallait s'y attendre, quand il apprit votre intention de l'attaquer, le Pape vous à declaré Anathème. Vous êtes désormais excommunié.
column4: Erwartungsgemäß, erklärte der Papst Sie Anathema als er hörte Sie drangen in ihn. Sie sind exkommuniziert.
column6: Como se podia esperar, despues de que se entero de su intencion de atacarle, el Papa te ha declarado Anatema. Ahora estas excomunicado.

column2: Our suzerain is now marching against the true Pope. Our suzerain has temporal authority over us, but the Pope's spiritual authority comes from God Himself! Shall we join the Guelfs, defenders of the Holy Father?
column3: Notre suzerain fait la guerre au Pape légitime. Notre suzerain detient sur nous l'autorité temporelle, mais l'autorité spirituelle du Pape découle de Dieu Lui-même! Devrions-nous rejoindre les Guelphes, défenseurs du Saint-Père?
column4: Unsere Suzerän jetzt führt Krieg gegen den wahren Papst. Unsere Suzerän hat weltliche Autorität über uns, aber geistliche Autorität des Papstes kommt von Gott selbst! Sollten wir die Guelfen, Verteidigern des Heiliger Vater, beitreten?
column6: Nuestro señor feudal está marchando en contra del verdadero Papa. Nuestro señor feudal tiene la autoridad temporal sobre nosotros, pero la autoridad espiritual del Papa viene de Dios mismo!¿Hay que unirse a los güelfos, defensores del Papa?

column2: War between temporal and spiritual powers has broken out again. Are we Guelfs, or Ghibellines?
column3: La guerre fait de nouveau rage entre le pouvoir spirituel et temporel. Sommes-nous Guelphes, ou Gibellins?
column4: Ein neues Krieg kommt, weltlich Macht gegen geistlich Macht. Sind wir Guelfen, oder Ghibellinen?
column6: Una nueva guerra se acerca, el poder secular contra el poder espiritual. ¿Estamos güelfos o gibelinos?

column2: The war is over..we must pay at least lip service to our oaths.
column3: La guerre est finie. Nous devons au moins faire semblant de respecter nos serments.
column4: Der Krieg ist vorbei. Wir müssen zumindest so tun, als unsere Eide zu respektieren.
column6: La guerra ha terminado. Por lo menos debemos pretender respetar nuestros juramentos.

column2: An opportunity has arisen to attempt the kidnapping of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. My fellow plotters are just waiting for my signal to proceed.
column3: Une occasion s'est présentée de tenter l'enlèvement de [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Mes collègues conspirateurs n'attendent que mon signal pour commencer.
column4: Eine Gelegenheit ist entstanden, um die Entführung von [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] zu versuchen. Meine Verschwörer warten nur auf mein Signal, um fortzufahren.
column6: An opportunity has arisen to attempt the kidnapping of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. My fellow plotters are just waiting for my signal to proceed.

column2: As I was sleeping, [From.GetTitledFirstName] broke into my bedchamber and put a dagger to my throat. I was forced out into the courtyard, where [From.GetHerHis] co-conspirators were waiting on fast horses. [From.GetTitledFirstName] now has me locked up in the basement of [From.GetHerHis] manor and is demanding that I give [From.GetHerHim] the land [From.GetSheHe] considers rightfully [From.GetHerHis]. If I refuse, [From.GetSheHe] is threatening to kill me...
column3: Alors que je dormais, [From.GetTitledFirstName] a pénétré dans ma chambre et m'a mis une dague sous la gorge. J'ai été conduit jusque dans la cour, où [From.GetHerHis] co-conspirateurs attendaient sur des montures fraîches. [From.GetTitledFirstName] m'a désormais enfermé au sous-sol de [From.GetHerHis] manoir et m'a demandé de lui donner la terre qu'[From.GetSheHe] considère comme son droit légitime.Si je refuse, [From.GetSheHe] m'a menacé de me tuer...
column4: Während ich schlief, brach [From.GetTitledFirstName] in meine Kammer ein und setze mir einen Dolch an die Kehle. Ich wurde in den Innenhof gebracht wo bereits [From.GetHerHis]e Mitverschwörer mit schnellen Pferden warteten. [From.GetTitledFirstName] kerkerte mich im Verlies von [From.GetHerHis] ein und verlangte, dass ich [From.GetHerHim] die Ländereien von [From.GetHerHim] an [From.GetSheHe] übergebe, die rechtmäßig [From.GetHerHis] gehören. Wenn ich mich weigere, droht [From.GetSheHe], mich zu töten.
column6: As I was sleeping, [From.GetTitledFirstName] broke into my bedchamber and put a dagger to my throat. I was forced out into the courtyard, where [From.GetHerHis] co-conspirators were waiting on fast horses. [From.GetTitledFirstName] now has me locked up in the basement of [From.GetHerHis] manor and is demanding that I give [From.GetHerHim] the land [From.GetSheHe] considers rightfully [From.GetHerHis]. If I refuse, [From.GetSheHe] is threatening to kill me...

column2: My guards caught [From.GetTitledFirstName] just as [From.GetSheHe] was about to break into my bedchamber, dagger in hand. Under interrogation, [From.GetSheHe] has confessed to planning to kidnap me to force me to give [From.GetHerHim] lands and a title.
column3: Mes gardent ont attrapé [From.GetTitledFirstName] juste au moment où [From.GetSheHe] allait pénétrer dans ma chambre, dague à la main. Sous la question,[From.GetSheHe] a confessé son projet de m'enlever pour me forcer à lui donner des terres et un titre.
column4: Meine Wachen schnappten [From.GetTitledFirstName] gerade als [From.GetSheHe]  versuchte in meine Gemächer einzudringen. Mit einem Dolch in der Hand !. Im Verhör gstand  [From.GetSheHe] das er plante mich zu kidnapen um mich zu zwingen Ländereien und Titel an [From.GetHerHim] zu geben.
column6: My guards caught [From.GetTitledFirstName] just as [From.GetSheHe] was about to break into my bedchamber, dagger in hand. Under interrogation, [From.GetSheHe] has confessed to planning to kidnap me to force me to give [From.GetHerHim] lands and a title.

column2: My co-conspirators send word that they have prepared everything we need to discredit [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Documents of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] corruption have been prepared, and courtiers have been bribed to whisper to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]'s incompetence. With [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] reputation in tatters, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will find it impossible to hold on to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] position on the council.
column3: Mes co-conspirateurs m'ont prévenu qu'ils ont préparé tout ce qu'il faut pour discréditer [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Les documents compromettant ont été préparés, et les courtisans ont été soudoyés répandre des rumeurs à la cour de [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. Une fois sa réputation en lambeaux, il ne lui sera plus possible de conserver son poste à la cour
column4: Meine Mitverschwörer senden wort, dass sie alles das wir brauchen, um [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] zu diskreditieren haben. Dokumente um [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] Korruption dar zu legen wurden hergestellt und Höflinge wurden bestochen an [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] zu flüstern von [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]'s Inkompetenz . Mit [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] Ruf in Fetzen, wird [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] es unmöglich finden um [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] Position auf dem Konzil zu halten.
column6: My co-conspirators send word that they have prepared everything we need to discredit [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Documents of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] corruption have been prepared, and courtiers have been bribed to whisper to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]'s incompetence. With [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] reputation in tatters, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will find it impossible to hold on to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] position on the council.

column2: I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Rumors of incompetence and corruption have undermined the authority of my position, and it seems that even [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] have come to believe them as I have been removed from my position at the council.
column3: Je me suis trouvé la cible d'une violente campagne de diffamation à la cour. Les rumeurs d'incompétence et de corruption ont miné ma réputation, et il semble que même le/la [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] en est venu à les croire que j'ai été démis de mes fonctions au conseil.
column4: Ich bin das Ziel einer bösartigen Verleumdungskampagne bei Hof. Gerüchte von Inkompetenz und Korruption haben die Autorität meiner Position untergraben, und es scheint, dass auch [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] an die Entscheidung gekommen, sie zu glauben, als ich von meiner Position auf dem Konzil entfernt wurden.
column6: I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Rumors of incompetence and corruption have undermined the authority of my position, and it seems that even [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] have come to believe them as I have been removed from my position at the council.

column2: The attempt to discredit [From.GetTitledFirstName] was a success! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has dismissed [From.GetHerHim] from the council and [From.GetHerHis] position is now vacant and ready for me to occupy.
column3: La tentative pour discréditer [From.GetTitledFirstName] a été un succès! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] l'a renvoyé du conseil, son poste est maintenant libre et prêt pour mon investiture.
column4: Der Versuch, [From.GetTitledFirstName] zu diskreditieren war erfolgreich! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] hat [From.GetHerHim] aus dem Rat abgewiesen und [From.GetHerHis] Position ist jetzt frei und bereit für mich zu besetzen.
column6: The attempt to discredit [From.GetTitledFirstName] was a success! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has dismissed [From.GetHerHim] from the council and [From.GetHerHis] position is now vacant and ready for me to occupy.

column2: Lately it seems that I have heard nothing but bad of [From.GetTitledFirstName], from whispers of incompetence at court to documents proving [From.GetHerHis] corruption slipped under my bedroom door at night. I refused to believe it at first, but in the end I could not deny the weight of the evidence and was forced to remove [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] position at court.
column3: Dernièrement, j'ai entendu des rumeurs quant à l'incompétence de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. La nuit sous ma porte, quelqu'un a glissé des documents prouvant son implication dans des affaires de corruption. J'ai refusé d'y croire au premier abord, mais finalement je ne pouvais nier l'évidence et j'ai été contraint de retirer à [From.GetTitledFirstName] son poste à la cour.
column4: In letzter Zeit scheint es, dass ich nichts hörte, außer schlechtes von [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Von Flüstern der Inkompetenz am Hof, zur Dokumente von [From.GetHerHis] Korruption von die unter meiner Schlafzimmertür eines Nachtes geschlüpft wurde. Ich weigerte mich, es zuerst zu glauben, aber am Ende konnte ich es nicht leugnen. Das Gewicht der Beweismittel zwang mich [From.GetTitledFirstName] aus [From.GetHerHis] Stellung beim Hof zu entfernen.
column6: Lately it seems that I have heard nothing but bad of [From.GetTitledFirstName], from whispers of incompetence at court to documents proving [From.GetHerHis] corruption slipped under my bedroom door at night. I refused to believe it at first, but in the end I could not deny the weight of the evidence and was forced to remove [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] position at court.

column2: I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Whispers of incompetence and accusations of corruption have been directed at me, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have refused to give them credence and ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. Although the investigation turned up nothing, my position at court is secure.
column3: Je me suis trouvé la cible d'une violente campagne de diffamation à la cour. Des rumeurs d'incompétence et des accusations de corruption ont été dirigées contre moi, mais heureusement [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] à refusé de leur donner créance et a ordonné une enquête sur la source de ces rumeurs. Bien que l'enquête n'a rien donné, ma position à la cour est sécurisée.
column4: Ich habe mich das Ziel einer bösartigen Verleumdungskampagne beim Hof gefunden. Flüstern der Inkompetenz und vorwürfe der Korruptions sind mir angerichtet. Glücklicherweiser hat [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] sich geweigert die Glaubwürdigkeit diese vorwürfe  zu würdigen und dazu geordnet eine Untersuchung der Quelle diese Gerüchte. Obwohl die Untersuchung nichts tauchte ist meine Position beim Hof sicher.
column6: I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Whispers of incompetence and accusations of corruption have been directed at me, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have refused to give them credence and ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. Although the investigation turned up nothing, my position at court is secure.

column2: Despite the rumors and accusations directed at [From.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] refused to dismiss [From.GetHerHim] from the council and has ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. Fortunately, the investigation turned up no evidence of my involvement.
column3: Malgré les rumeurs et accusations dirigées contre [From.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] a refusé de le renvoyer du conseil et a ordonné une enquête sur la source de ces rumeurs. Heureusement, l'enquête n'a mis à jour aucune preuve de mon implication.
column4: Despite the rumors and accusations directed at [From.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] refused to dismiss [From.GetHerHim] from the council and has ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. column2: Lately it seems that I have heard nothing but bad of [From.GetTitledFirstName], from whispers of incompetence at court to documents proving [From.GetHerHis] corruption slipped under my bedroom door at night. I refused to believe the accusations, and ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. A thorough questioning of the court turned up nothing, but has at least put a stop to the slanderous accusations.

La nuit sous ma porte, quelqu'un a glissé des documents prouvant son implication dans des affaires de corruption. J'ai refusé de croire ces accusations et ordonné une enquête sur la source de ces rumeurs. L'interrogatoire n'a rien donné, mais cela a au moins mis un terme aux accusations calomnieuses.

column2: The tithes and taxes for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] are on their way to [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] castle and my co-conspirators have bribed the guards not to notice if a chest or two should go 'missing'. Everything is ready for the robbery to proceed.
column3: Le convoi transportant la dîme et les taxes collectées pour [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] est sur le chemin du château. Mes co-conspirateurs ont soudoyé les gardes afin qu'ils ne remarquent pas l'éventuelle disparition d'un coffre ou deux,  tout est prêt pour effectuer le vol.
column4: The tithes and taxes for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] are on their way to [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] castle and my co-conspirators have bribed the guards not to notice if a chest or two should go 'missing'. Everything is ready for the robbery to proceed.
column6: The tithes and taxes for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] are on their way to [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] castle and my co-conspirators have bribed the guards not to notice if a chest or two should go 'missing'. Everything is ready for the robbery to proceed.

column2: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today and were placed in the treasury. As I was inspecting the chests full of gold, it struck me that there seemed to be fewer of them than what had arrived earlier. A quick check of the treasurer's accounts revealed my worst fears...
column3: Le convoi transportant les impôts et la dîme collectés est arrivé au château aujourd'hui et les coffres ont été placés dans le trésor. Lorsque nous avons inspecté la livraison, il m'a semblé qu'il en manquait par rapport à la précédente perception. Une vérification rapide des comptes du trésorier a confirmé mes craintes...
column4: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today and were placed in the treasury. As I was inspecting the chests full of gold, it struck me that there seemed to be fewer of them than what had arrived earlier. A quick check of the treasurer's accounts revealed my worst fears...
column6: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today and were placed in the treasury. As I was inspecting the chests full of gold, it struck me that there seemed to be fewer of them than what had arrived earlier. A quick check of the treasurer's accounts revealed my worst fears...

column2: As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, several large chests full of gold made their way onto the back of a wagon which left the castle unnoticed. The gold is now safely locked away in my treasury and my co-conspirators have all received their share.
column3: Les taxes ont été transportés dans le trésor, plusieurs grands coffres pleins d'or ont fait leur chemin à l'arrière d'un wagon et ont quitté le château inaperçu. L'or est désormais en toute sécurité et mes co-conspirateurs ont tous reçu leur part.
column4: As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, several large chests full of gold made their way onto the back of a wagon which left the castle unnoticed. The gold is now safely locked away in my treasury and my co-conspirators have all received their share.
column6: As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, several large chests full of gold made their way onto the back of a wagon which left the castle unnoticed. The gold is now safely locked away in my treasury and my co-conspirators have all received their share.

column2: I have received my share of the money embezzled by [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
column3: J'ai reçu ma part de l'argent de [From.GetTitledFirstName] détourné par  [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
column4: I have received my share of the money embezzled by [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
column6: I have received my share of the money embezzled by [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].

column2: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today. As I was watching the money being carried into the treasury, I noticed some shadowy figures trying to make off with several chests full of gold. I had my guards seize them, and under questioning they revealed themselves to be in the employ of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. What shall be done with my thieving vassal?
column3: Le convoi transportant la dîme et les taxes collectées arriva au château aujourd'hui. Alors que je surveillais le transfert, j'ai remarqué quelques silhouettes qui tentaient de faire main basse sur plusieurs coffres pleins d'or. Je les ai mis immédiatement aux arrêts et pendant l'interrogatoire, ils ont révélés être à la solde de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Que faire de ce vassal sournois ?
column4: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today. As I was watching the money being carried into the treasury, I noticed some shadowy figures trying to make off with several chests full of gold. I had my guards seize them, and under questioning they revealed themselves to be in the employ of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. What shall be done with my thieving vassal?
column6: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today. As I was watching the money being carried into the treasury, I noticed some shadowy figures trying to make off with several chests full of gold. I had my guards seize them, and under questioning they revealed themselves to be in the employ of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. What shall be done with my thieving vassal?

column2: As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, my men tried to make off with several chests of gold but were spotted by [From.GetTitledFirstName], who had come out to inspect the process [From.GetHerHim]self. Under questioning they revealed to myself to be in my employ, and now [From.GetTitledFirstName] knows that I attempted to rob [From.GetHerHim].
column3: Le convoi transportant la dîme et les taxes collectées arriva au château aujourd'hui. Mes hommes ont tenté de faire main basse sur plusieurs coffres d'or, mais ont été repérés par [From.GetTitledFirstName], qui était sorti pour inspecter le processus . Ils ont été arreté, pendant l'interrogatoire, ils ont révélé être à mon service et maintenant [From.GetTitledFirstName] sait que j'ai essayé de  [From.GetHerHim] voler.
column4: As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, my men tried to make off with several chests of gold but were spotted by [From.GetTitledFirstName], who had come out to inspect the process [From.GetHerHim]self. Under questioning they revealed to myself to be in my employ, and now [From.GetTitledFirstName] knows that I attempted to rob [From.GetHerHim].
column6: As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, my men tried to make off with several chests of gold but were spotted by [From.GetTitledFirstName], who had come out to inspect the process [From.GetHerHim]self. Under questioning they revealed to myself to be in my employ, and now [From.GetTitledFirstName] knows that I attempted to rob [From.GetHerHim].

column2: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will soon be leaving the castle to go on a trip to the countryside with only a small guard. My co-conspirators have prepared an ambush and are only waiting for my signal to attack the carriage and abduct [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].
column3: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] va bientôt quitter le château pour un voyage à la campagne avec seulement une petite escorte. Mes co-conspirateurs ont préparé une embuscade et n'attendent que mon signal pour attaquer le convoi et l'enlever.
column4: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will soon be leaving the castle to go on a trip to the countryside with only a small guard. My co-conspirators have prepared an ambush and are only waiting for my signal to attack the carriage and abduct [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].
column6: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will soon be leaving the castle to go on a trip to the countryside with only a small guard. My co-conspirators have prepared an ambush and are only waiting for my signal to attack the carriage and abduct [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].

column2: As I was travelling through the countryside, a band of masked thugs on horses attacked my carriage. My guards fled or were cut down were they stood, and I found myself blindfolded, bound and thrown over the back of a horse. When my blindfold was removed, I was in the dungeons of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
column3: Comme je voyageais à travers la campagne, une bande de voyous masqués ont attaqué ma voiture. Mes gardes ont fui ou ont été abattus et je me suis retrouvé les yeux bandés, ligoté et jeté sur le dos d'un cheval. Lorsque mon bandeau a été enlevé, j'étais dans les cachots de [From.GetTitledFirstName].
column4: As I was travelling through the countryside, a band of masked thugs on horses attacked my carriage. My guards fled or were cut down were they stood, and I found myself blindfolded, bound and thrown over the back of a horse. When my blindfold was removed, I was in the dungeons of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
column6: As I was travelling through the countryside, a band of masked thugs on horses attacked my carriage. My guards fled or were cut down were they stood, and I found myself blindfolded, bound and thrown over the back of a horse. When my blindfold was removed, I was in the dungeons of [From.GetTitledFirstName].

column2: We ambushed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s carriage on a lonely stretch of road in the countryside. The guards scattered before us, and one of my men blindfolded and bound [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] is now safely locked away in my dungeon, to do with as I please.
column3: Nous avons attaqué la voiture de [From.GetTitledFirstName] sur une route de campagne isolée. Mes agents ont mis en déroute son escorte et l’un de mes hommes l’a capturé et ligoté. [From.GetSheHeCap] est maintenant à ma disposition enfermé dans mon cachot.
column4: We ambushed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s carriage on a lonely stretch of road in the countryside. The guards scattered before us, and one of my men blindfolded and bound [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] is now safely locked away in my dungeon, to do with as I please.
column6: We ambushed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s carriage on a lonely stretch of road in the countryside. The guards scattered before us, and one of my men blindfolded and bound [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] is now safely locked away in my dungeon, to do with as I please.

column2: As I was travelling through the countryside, a band of masked thugs on horses attacked my carriage. After a brief skirmish my guards fought them off, but unfortunately failed to take any captives.
column3: Comme je voyageais à travers la campagne, une bande de voyous masqués ont attaqué ma voiture. Après une brève escarmouche mes gardes les ont repoussés, mais pris par surprise, ils n'ont pas eu l'occasion de faire des prisonniers.
column4: As I was travelling through the countryside, a band of masked thugs on horses attacked my carriage. After a brief skirmish my guards fought them off, but unfortunately failed to take any captives.
column6: As I was travelling through the countryside, a band of masked thugs on horses attacked my carriage. After a brief skirmish my guards fought them off, but unfortunately failed to take any captives.

column2: We ambushed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s carriage on a lonely stretch of road in the countryside. The guards put up a fierce resistance, and after a brief skirmish we were forced to retreat without accomplishing our objective.
column3: Nous avons attaqué la voiture de [From.GetTitledFirstName] sur une route de campagne isolée. Les gardes nous ont opposé une résistance farouche, et après avoir subit de lourde pertes avons été obligés de battre en retraite sans avoir atteint notre objectif.
column4: We ambushed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s carriage on a lonely stretch of road in the countryside. The guards put up a fierce resistance, and after a brief skirmish we were forced to retreat without accomplishing our objective.
column6: We ambushed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s carriage on a lonely stretch of road in the countryside. The guards put up a fierce resistance, and after a brief skirmish we were forced to retreat without accomplishing our objective.

column2: As I was travelling through the countryside, a band of masked thugs on horses attacked my carriage. After a brief skirmish my guards fought them off, taking several of them prisoner. After a brief interrogation they revealed themselves to be working under orders from [From.GetTitledFirstName] to abduct me.
column3: Comme je voyageais à travers la campagne, une bande de voyous masqués a attaqué ma voiture. Après un âpre combat, mes gardes les ont repoussés, faisant plusieurs prisonniers. Lors de l’interrogatoire, ils ont avoué que leur objectif était de m’enlever pour le compte de[From.GetTitledFirstName].
column4: As I was travelling through the countryside, a band of masked thugs on horses attacked my carriage. After a brief skirmish my guards fought them off, taking several of them prisoner. After a brief interrogation they revealed themselves to be working under orders from [From.GetTitledFirstName] to abduct me.

After a brief interrogation they revealed themselves to be working under orders from [From.GetTitledFirstName] to abduct me.

column2: We ambushed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s carriage on a lonely stretch of road in the countryside. The guards put up a fierce resistance, and several of my men were captured before we could escape.
column3: Nous avons attaqué la voiture de [From.GetTitledFirstName] sur une route de campagne isolée. Les gardes nous ont opposé une résistance farouche, et après une brève escarmouche nous avons été obligés de battre en retraite sans avoir atteint notre objectif, pire encore, certains de mes hommes ont été capturés.
column4: We ambushed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s carriage on a lonely stretch of road in the countryside. The guards put up a fierce resistance, and several of my men were captured before we could escape.
column6: We ambushed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s carriage on a lonely stretch of road in the countryside. The guards put up a fierce resistance, and several of my men were captured before we could escape.

column2: My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s liege is planning to move against him. As soon as I give the word, they will present this information to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] along with my seal to convince [From.GetHerHim] of their authenticity.
column3: Mes co-conspirateurs ont fabriqué des preuves attestant que le seigneur de [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] a l'intention de se retourner contre lui. Dès que j'en donnerai l'ordre, ils présenteront ces documents à [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] apposé de mon sceau afin de [From.GetHerHim] convaincre  de son authenticité.
column4: My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s liege is planning to move against him. As soon as I give the word, they will present this information to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] along with my seal to convince [From.GetHerHim] of their authenticity.
column6: My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s liege is planning to move against him. As soon as I give the word, they will present this information to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] along with my seal to convince [From.GetHerHim] of their authenticity.

column2: A letter arrived today from [From.GetTitledName]. Inside was incontroversible evidence that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is planning to have me arrested and banished on trumped-up charges of treason.
column3: Une lettre est arrivée aujourd'hui de [From.GetTitledName]. A l'intérieur, des éléments de preuve irréfutables que [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] a l'intention de me faire arrêter et bannir sur de fausses accusations de trahison.
column4: A letter arrived today from [From.GetTitledName]. Inside was incontroversible evidence that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is planning to have me arrested and banished on trumped-up charges of treason.
column6: A letter arrived today from [From.GetTitledName]. Inside was incontroversible evidence that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is planning to have me arrested and banished on trumped-up charges of treason.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was completely fooled by the fabricated evidence I sent [From.GetHerHim] and has risen up in revolt against [From.GetHerHis] liege.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] a été complètement dupé par les preuves fabriquées que j'ai envoyé  et s'est révolté contre son suzerain.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was completely fooled by the fabricated evidence I sent [From.GetHerHim] and has risen up in revolt against [From.GetHerHis] liege.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was completely fooled by the fabricated evidence I sent [From.GetHerHim] and has risen up in revolt against [From.GetHerHis] liege.

column3: Quelqu'un a essayé de me faire arrêter pour trahison en glissant des «preuves» fabriqué sous la porte de la chambre de [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], mais heureusement [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] n'a pas cru ce qui c'est présenté à [Root.Liege.GetHerHim].

column2: As I was getting ready to sleep, I heard a scuffle from outside my bedroom door. Rushing outside, I found that my guards had seized a cloaked man as he was attempting to slip some documents into the room. Under questioning, he revealed that he was working for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and that the documents were fabricated evidence intended to turn me against my vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName].
column3: Comme je m'apprêtais à dormir, j'ai entendu une bagarre derrière la porte de ma chambre. Me précipitant à l'extérieur l'arme a la main, j'ai constaté que mes gardes avaient saisi un homme masqué alors qu'il tentait de glisser des documents dans ma chambre. En réponse aux questions, il a révélé qu'il travaillait pour [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] et que les documents ont été fabriqués dans l'intention de semer la discorde entre mon vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName] et moi.

What's worse, [From.RelHead.GetSheHe] had the messenger questioned and found out that I sent it! I have been censured for my 'unseemly scheming' and [From.GetTitledFirstName] knows that I tried to have [From.GetHerHim] excommunicated.

column2: Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. Though the evidence is obviously a forgery, it seems almost everyone in the realm has been fooled by it, and I fear I am about to be arrested.
column3: Des documents compromettant m'accusant de traitrise contre [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] ont circulé à travers le royaume. Bien que ces preuves soient fabriquées, il semble que cela été dupé presque tout le monde dans le royaume, et je crains que le jour de mon arrestation approche.
